title: Reg Lookup
description: The RegLookup application is a web-based tool designed to retrieve vehicle information based on a UK vehicle registration number. It fetches data from the DVLA MOT history API and displays relevant details to the user including mileage graph. The application is built using Next.js and deployed on Vercel.

title: Sudoku
description: Sudoku app including a timer with pause and resume functionality, number panel and user-feedback upon correct submission. Future work would be to automatically create new sudoku grids and implement user accounts to allow for progression records and daily challenges.
